126  template <class T>
127  plExternalFunction(const plVariablesConjunction &input_params,
128  T *obj,
129  void (T::*method)(plValues &output_values,
130  const plValues &input_values),
131  std::string func_name = "")
132  : plUserFunction()
133  , function_at_kernel_(0)
134  {
135  gen_name_if_empty(func_name);
136  set_function_at_kernel(
137  new kplExternalMethod<T>(input_params.get_variable_list(),
138  obj, method, func_name));
139  }
140 
146 #ifndef SWIG // the "const" on the method type trips up Swig's parser
147  template <class T>
148  plExternalFunction(const plVariablesConjunction &input_params,
149  const T *obj,
150  void (T::*method)(plValues &output_values,
151  const plValues &input_values) const,
152  std::string func_name = "")
153  : plUserFunction()
154  , function_at_kernel_(0)
155  {
156  gen_name_if_empty(func_name);
157  set_function_at_kernel(
158  new kplConstExternalMethod<T>(input_params.get_variable_list(),
159  obj, method, func_name));
160  }
161 #endif /* SWIG */
162 
168  template <class T>
169  plExternalFunction(const plVariablesConjunction &output_params,
170  const plVariablesConjunction &input_params,
171  T *obj,
172  void (T::*method)(plValues &output_values,
173  const plValues &input_values),
174  std::string func_name = "")
175  : plUserFunction()
176  , function_at_kernel_(0)
177  {
178  gen_name_if_empty(func_name);
179  set_function_at_kernel(
180  new kplExternalMethod<T>(output_params.get_variable_list(),
181  input_params.get_variable_list(),
182  obj, method, func_name));
183  }
184 
190 #ifndef SWIG // the "const" on the method type trips up Swig's parser
191  template <class T>
192  plExternalFunction(const plVariablesConjunction &output_params,
193  const plVariablesConjunction &input_params,
194  const T *obj,
195  void (T::*method)(plValues &output_values,
196  const plValues &input_values) const,
197  std::string func_name = "")
198  : plUserFunction()
199  , function_at_kernel_(0)
200  {
201  gen_name_if_empty(func_name);
202  set_function_at_kernel(
203  new kplConstExternalMethod<T>(output_params.get_variable_list(),
204  input_params.get_variable_list(),
205  obj, method, func_name));
206  }
207 #endif /* SWIG */
